messages.content: Hello new person! My name is Eon and youâ€™re probably wondering what the fuck is going on right now! Iâ€™m here to explain some things so you donâ€™t get overwhelmed and immediately mute the server!
Everyone on this server has moderator privileges. That means you can change the channel icon, create and assign yourself roles, create new channels, and the like!

In order to prevent the entire server from being repeatedly deleted again there is one category (the one youâ€™re in right now) where mod privileges are limited to a select number of individuals. All the most used, generic channels go in here.

Who moderates this category and gets special privileges is established ~~in the meta rp channel. The actual name of the channel changes over time (examples include democracy, the senate, the new deal, and meta rp). Every two to four weeks the power structure will change depending partly on who seizes it and partly~~ by the whims of those already in charge.
Also donâ€™t forget to drink water ðŸ‘€
If youâ€™re a minor you have to tell us so we can kick you from the server, sorry ðŸ‘‰ðŸ‘ˆ
@everyone ^that's serious, it's for your safety as well as ours

also **i would recommend pronouns in nicknames** but because of the nature of this server we can't force anyone. if you don't want to, it would probably better just to say nothing about it for any number of reasons
If you have a genuine problem with someone please just talk to them before coming to me. Honest communication in good faith does wonders.

those of you who have multiple channels or those of you who wish to create many channels, Iâ€™d like to encourage you to create categories for you channels (like revolutionary France). It helps with organization and makes it less likely that someone else will go dead channel must delete ðŸ˜‚. That is all, and have a wonderful day you beautiful human being :3
(Please start reading from the top of the channel. Thank you!)
This server is where I frankly collect and integrate my various social circles to create a larger, stronger community. Itâ€™s loud, and chaotic, and I hope you have fun :3.
Feel free to invite new people, as long as theyâ€™re chill :3
Unused channels get repurposed. This is a threat ðŸ‘€

The primary engagement points of this server are:
1) To create your own personal space and fill it with whatever interests/ is important to you
2) To generally interact with the chill people on the server
Introductions are always appreciated but not required. <#928813113220952064>

Channel viewability is limited until you get the anarchy role to reduce the overwhelming factor (and so inactive people don't suddenly nuke the server again). @ either me or the archivist role so we can bestow upon you the powers of anarchy.

If you want to delete a channel, **especially if you did not make that channel**, please move it into the attic category instead. This helps with:

1) me being a sentimental bastard who likes backreading
2) if someone else didnâ€™t want that channel deleted, they can dig it back out.

Thank you and have a nice day :3
(Please start reading from the top of the channel. Thank you!)
It is generally frowned upon to steal my devices to get admin powers but I donâ€™t care enough to stop yâ€™all ðŸ˜‚
Like you could ðŸ‘€ -kai
~~PSA: If you or someone you know got uwuified  you may be ewigibwe for financiaw compensation  my boyfwiend stowe my phone and did it.~~

I am surrounded by shitposters. There is no information for new people here just the dwindling sanity of a man who has made a few to many mistakes.

If you abuse the at everyone you will lose at everyone privileges. If you many people abuse at everyone privileges then everyone will lose at everyone privileges

Congratulations on turning me into a discord mod yah motherfuckers ðŸ˜‚

Update to discord terms of service forfeits your right to class action lawsuits. Email this template to the listed address by may 15th to not lose this right.

Send your email to : arbitration-opt-out@discord.com
Subject: Arbitration Opt-Out - [User-ID]
Message:

Hello, This message is to exercise my right to opt out and not be bound by the Discord provisions requiring arbitration.

User Information
Email: [Email]
User ID: [User-ID]

Sincerely, 
[Name]
Donate excess compute to science: https://boinc.berkeley.edu/projects.php
We like stationary and fountain pens

@everyone the chat bots have been isolated to <#1291072672393859102> within the protected zone. Channel/category owners, fee free to use <@&1291072499198722048> to manage the permissions on Sydney and Rodgers. Apologies for the @ and have a wonderful rest of your days!
React thumbs up to this message if you would like @ everyone privaleges to be globally revoked. React thumbs down if you would like to keep the current status quo.
